Title: Establishes civil penalties for knowingly making a false report of suspected child abuse or mistreatment and creates procedures for determining whether such a violation has occurred
Summary: Establishes civil penalties for knowingly making a false report of suspected child abuse or mistreatment and creates procedures for determining whether such a violation has occurred.
LawCode: Amd ยง422, Soc Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, in relation to false allegations of suspected child abuse and maltreatment
